element.name: Group
element.description: RWT Group controls. Groups are labeled boxes used to group sets of controls.

property.name: color
property.description: Text color for group boxes. Applied to the group box label.

property.name: font
property.description: Font for group boxes. Applied to the group box label.

style.name: BORDER
style.description: Indicates that the group box should have a border.

element.name: Group-Frame
element.description: The frame that contains the child controls.

property.name: margin
property.description: Margin for group box frames (outer space around the frame).

property.name: padding
property.description: Padding for group box frames (inner distance between frame border and content).

element.name: Group-Label
element.description: The label of a group box.

property.name: padding
property.description: Padding for group box labels (space around the label text).

property.name: margin
property.description: Margin for group box labels (offset of the group box label).

boxdim.name: group.margin
boxdim.description: Margin for group boxes (space between frame and parent)

boxdim.name: group.padding
boxdim.description: Padding for group boxes (space between frame and content)

boxdim.name: group.label.margin
boxdim.description: Margin for group box labels (defines offset of the group label)

boxdim.name: group.label.padding
boxdim.description: Padding for group box labels (defines space around group label text)

font.name: group.label.font
font.default: 11px 'Segoe UI', Corbel, Calibri, Tahoma, 'Lucida Sans Unicode', sans-serif
